title: Retirement Advisor: Public Finances And Your Retirement Location
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Warren Buffett offered some retirement advice a year ago, little noticed at the time, which is more relevant now than then. This podcast (7:24) recalls the Oracle of Omaha’s post-annual-letter CNBC interview, where Buffett advised people take appropriate due diligence on just what liabilities they’re “walking into.” Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
